item.title: Re: for the hanging out ally and stuff
item.content:encoded: Well, it USED to be 0 chakra cost when hanging out with someone, but it was changed some time ago. Before that, hottie regen was hard coded not to be abusable by not giving the stamina even if you could use it again.

item.title: Re: for the hanging out ally and stuff
item.content:encoded: No, "and their jutsu cost 0 chakra for the day" was wrong, that's what I meant.If you use Hottie Regen, you end up with 0 chakra for today and tomorrow, which means you CAN use jutsus which cost 0 chakra.So it would be infinitely abusable if what RazyVan said were true.

item.title: Re: for the hanging out ally and stuff
item.content:encoded: Not at all, paying chakra is part of the negligible part of Hottie regen, the real drawback is being chakra locked.

item.title: Re: for the hanging out ally and stuff
item.content:encoded: 0 chakra is wrong, you get to use their jutsus at half the cost.Otherwise Hottie Regeneration would be abusable.

item.title: Re: for the hanging out ally and stuff
item.content:encoded:
Hanging out with allies lets you learn their jutsu at half price and their jutsu cost 0 chakra for the day.This is the same for all allies.
If you want to hang out with anon and right at the same time to get teh Note lv.2,you can use,eg.A make-out mood enhancer or the floating on air theme.

You do not need to do specific missions to hang out with allies,only to level them up.Therefore,no mission will let you automatically hang out with allies.
